function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of COVID-19 ontology for surveillance activities","Impact":"Inadequate surveillance and monitoring of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Regular update and validation of ontology, integration with real-time data sources","Technologies":"Ontology editor, AI for data integration and validation","People":"Public health officials, epidemiologists, data scientists","Owner":"Public health organizations, research institutions"},{"Description":"Text mining approaches and semantic interoperability using COVID-19 ontology","Impact":"Inaccurate or incomplete understanding of disease epidemiology and clinical aspects","Mitigation":"Quality checks and validation of text mining results, integration with clinical data and expert validation","Technologies":"Text mining tools, AI for data validation, clinical information systems","People":"Researchers, clinicians, epidemiologists","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Development of COviD-19 Ontology for cases and patients information (CODO)","Impact":"Inefficient modeling and annotation of COVID-19 information, leading to inaccurate data analysis","Mitigation":"Standardization of ontology terms, validation with clinical data, integration with standardized data sources","Technologies":"Ontology editor, data validation tools, clinical information systems","People":"Data analysts, researchers, healthcare providers","Owner":"Research institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
